items.title: Create and Assign Tasks
items.description: Allow users to create tasks, assign them to team members, and set due dates.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a task with title, description, assignee, and due date
Assigned team member receives a notification
Task appears in both creator's and assignee's task list
dependencies: User authentication and team management module
non_functional: System should handle up to 1000 concurrent users without performance degradation
Task creation and assignment should complete within 2 seconds

items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Provide real-time updates to all team members when a task is created, updated, or completed.
acceptance_criteria: Changes to tasks are visible to all team members within 2 seconds
No manual page refresh is required to see updates
non_functional: System should maintain update latency under 2 seconds for 95% of events
Support for WebSocket or similar real-time protocol

notes: User requirement was high-level; assumed core features include task creation, assignment, and real-time collaboration. Additional features like comments, file attachments, and reporting may be considered in future iterations.
